name: cut
desc: Create a subset of your input on one side of a planar surface.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Cut Type
properties.desc: The Cut Type is how the cutting plane is specified.

properties.name: Cut Direction
properties.desc: The Cut Direction is used to determine whether the mesh above or below the cutting plane is sent to the output port.

properties.name: X Position
properties.desc: The X Position of the cut plane(used with Easting and Rotatable).

properties.name: Y Position
properties.desc: The Y position of the cut plane(used with Northing and Rotatable).

properties.name: Z Position
properties.desc: The Z Position of the cut plane(used with Horizontal and Rotatable).

properties.name: Plane Rotation
properties.desc: The Plane Rotation control allows the user to set both the Head and the Dip of the Rotatable Cut Plane

properties.name: Reset
properties.desc: The Reset button will cause the Position of the cut plane to return to the center of the model.

properties.name: Nodal Data
properties.desc: The Nodal Data from the Input Field to include in the Output Field

properties.name: Color By
properties.desc: The Color By control allows the user to set how the color of the output should be determined.

properties.name: Max Edge Angle
properties.desc: The Max Edge Angle angle is defined as the angle between two faces or cells in the model.
